metadata.title: CVE-2022-1185 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability when rendering RDoc files in GitLab CE/EEversions 10 to 14.7.7, 14.8.0 to 14.8.5, and 14.9.0 to 14.9.2 allows anattacker to crash the GitLab web application with a maliciously craftedRDoc file

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
